title: The fund so received on account of sale proceeds of such tenements i
clause_text: The fund so received on account of sale proceeds of such tenements i.e. EWS,LIG,MIG, after deduction of cost of development including off site infrastructure charges for development of AH/R&R, 50% amount shall be utilized towards implementation of D.P. and rest amount shall be used for the development of AH/R&R tenements at other locations.
